name: Nim's Frustrating Adventure
description:
A cursed coin has transferred our friend, Nim, into a perilous dungeon filled with hidden spikes, walls that try to kill you and lacerating saws. Your wall jumping skill will be your only tool to help you navigate these problems and collect every coin, leading to your escape. If not… the dungeon will consume your brain, eat through your soul and leave you lifeless, trying to beg for mercy but you can’t speak, you can’t move, as you lay there wondering… wondering… wondering....

Enjoy our game :D

Programming: https://twitter.com/FreeTimeDev

Sounds/Music: https://twitter.com/imean_Kinda

Arts: https://twitter.com/Lewd_Siscon
